Posts.Content: Mar 3, 2015 08:17PM fairygirl713 wrote: Hi. I am almost 3 years post chemo and have yet to regrow my eye lashes and eye brows. The only hair that has some growth is on my head, but it is thin and wispy and I still feel like I look like a cancer patient. I am beginning to loose hope of ever growing it back. Has anyone else had trouble regrowing hair? Any suggestions? My nails grow like crazy though so I am a little confused. I thought It would have regrown by now.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
